A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Huh\, what did I just see?  This movie feels like Disney is digging into the franchise.  I just re watched the force awakens and was excited for this one but left the theater disappointed after watching The Last Jedi.

It just had that Disney touch to it. We all knew it would happen. The Rebels play out like a corporate HR ad.  

It's just so "Everybody is a winner" vibe that makes it feel like trash.   Meh!
